Enhanced Markdown

Page Variables

Each page has some predefined variables that you can use by wrapping their name in {{  }}. Below is a list of variables available for this page.

NameDescription
{{ variable.name }}

No variables available for this page

Page Templates

In additional to variables, pages can have templates which can be used by wrapping their name in ^  ^. Below is a list of templates available for this page.

NameDescription
{{ template.name }}

No templates available for this page
